thread.section_title: Columbus Direct Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Columbus Direct Australia | www.columbusdirect.com.au
thread.title: Dennis Carey
thread.title_full: Columbus Direct Australia reviewed by Dennis Carey

author: Dennis Carey
title: Dennis Carey
text: I have used your service over many years until you introduced an age limit of 65 ,I had to make a claim once about 10 years ago and had no problems what so ever. So I'm glad to find you have changed your policy and I can once again do business with you.
